title: What's the difference between the Redmi K30 and the Redmi K20 Pro? - Quora

response.answer_text: The main difference is the SoC , the redmi K30 comes with the new Snapdragon 730G which is built for gaming , we havr seen this in the devices like Realme X2 & it is great , on the other hand the redmi k20 pro is powered by the Snapdragon 855 , though this is last year SoC but still being 8 series SoC , it is more powerful than Snapdragon 730G , have better GPU. For the display , the redmi K30 spots a IPS LCD display , which is definitely downgrade from last years AMOLED , & i personally don't like it , also this one have that side mounted fingerprint scanner & trust me many people will not like it because of the simple fact that it is not practical placement they should have gone with rear mounted fingerprint scanner , if you have budget & if you can get some good deal i would say still the redmi k20 pro is much better device.
Redmi k 30 has a latest Sony 686 camera sensor of 64 MP. It has quad cameras in rear and dual cameras in front unlike k20 pro.design looks attractive than k20.processor is latest SD 730 G
